skills.name: YEAH NAH
desc: • Deal 5 hits of physical damage to a single target that increases based on your MAX HP.
• Permanently Reduce DEF on the target by 25%.
• Gain Perfect Health for 3 turns.
• Gain Ascension for 3 turns if the target has 4 or more beneficial and negative effects.

skills.name: ONLY ONE LEAVES
desc: • Remove All Beneficial Effects, including Golden effects, from the target.
• Remove and Prevent all Innate Shield and Damage Reduction effects on the target until they die. This effect does not apply to bosses.
• Inflict Perfect Disable and Perfect Corruption on the target for 3 turns.
• Gain Immortality for 3 turns if the target has 4 or more negative effects.
• Instantly gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: KNUCKLE DUSTER
desc: • Deal 2 hits of physical damage to a single target that increases based on your MAX HP.
• Reduce Max HP on the target by 25%.
• 35% Chance to gain an Extra Turn if the target has 4 or more beneficial and negative effects.

skills.name: CURB STOMP
desc: • Deal devastating true damage to a single target that increases based on your ATK and MAX HP.
• Inflict Cleave and Curse on the target for the duration of battle.
• Deal 4 hits of Additional True Damage to the target based on their MISSING HP if they are at 50% HP or below.
• Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

skills.name: SHOOT FIRST
desc: • Deal 2 hits of physical damage to a single target that increases based on your MAX HP.
• Remove all Immunity and Vanish effects, including Golden effects, from the target.
• Inflict Perfect Bleed and Punishment on the target for 2 turns.
• Permanently Increase Max HP of self by 50% if the target has 4 or more beneficial and negative effects.

skills.name: WASTELAND JUSTICE
desc: • Deal 4 hits of physical damage to all enemies that increases based on your MAX HP.
• Remove all Immunity and Vanish effects, including Golden effects, from all enemies.
• Inflict Exhaust and Punishment on all enemies for 3 turns.
• Steal a Beneficial and Golden effect from each enemy if they have 4 or more beneficial and negative effects.
• Reduce Power and Fury of your opponent to zero and prevent them from generating Power and Fury for 2 turns. Fury that is already fully charged cannot be reduced.

skills.name: FIGHT FOR YOUR LIFE
desc: • Deal devastating physical damage to a single target that increases based on your MAX HP.
• Take 99% of CURRENT HP as True Damage.
• Remove All Beneficial Effects, including Golden effects, from the target before dealing damage.
• Heal to full HP, Gain 12 Power and 50% Fury and gain an Extra Turn if the target is killed.
• Grant Physical Block, Magic Block, or True Block to each ally for the duration of battle.
• Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
• Cannot fall below 1 HP while using this skill.
